Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Misinterpretation \Mis`in*ter"pre*ta"tion\, n. The act of interpreting erroneously; a mistaken interpretation. [1913 Webster]
misinterpretation n : putting the wrong interpretation on; "his misinterpretation of the question caused his error"; "there was no mistaking her meaning" [syn: {misunderstanding}, {mistaking}]
